___publish_date.description: When the story was first published.

___canonical_url.description: The fully qualified URL to the story.

___short_url.description: A url-shorterned version of the canonical_url.

___revision.description: In systems with versioning / history, the id of the revision should be saved here

___status.description: Optional field to store story workflow related status (e.g. published/embargoed/etc)

___subheadlines.description: The subheadline(s) (or deks) for the story.

___editor_note.description: Additional information to be displayed in/near the story html content from the editor.

___label.description: What the Washington Post calls a Kicker

___source.description: Information about the original source and/or owner of this content

___related_content.description: A set of lists of IDs referencing other content items this story is related to.

___description.description: Description(s) of the story, keyed by context.

___display_date.description: The RFC3339-formatted dated time of the most recent date the story was (re)displayed on a public site.

___syndication.description: Key-boolean pair of syndication services where this article may go

___promo_images.description: List of promotional images to use when highlighting the story.

$eref.description: Holds common attributes of ANS Content objects.
$eref.title: A content object.

___transcript.description: A transcript of the contents of the video.

___rating.description: A rating of the video, to be used for appropriate age/content warnings.

___video_type.description: The type of video (e.g. clip, livestream, etc)

___duration.description: Runtime of the video in milliseconds.

___youtubeContentId.description: The YouTube ID of the content, if (re)hosted on youtube.com

___streams.description: The different streams this video can play in.

$eref.description: Configuration for a piece of video content, over a stream.
$eref.title: A stream of video.

___url.description: Where to get the stream from.

___filesize.description: The size of the video, in bytes.

$eref.description: Holds attributes of an ANS image component.
$eref.title: An image.

___promo_image.description: A promo/leader image to the video.

description: Holds attributes of an ANS video component.
title: A video.
